item.title: Eileen Fulton, ‘As the World Turns’ Star, Dies at 91
item.description: Eileen Fulton, who starred as Lisa Miller on the CBS soap opera “As the World Turns,” died Monday in Asheville, N.C., after a struggle with declining health. She was 91. Fulton’s dea
